verses.name: Mark 1:31
verses.text: And he came and took her by the hand, and lifted her up; and immediately the fever left her, and she ministered unto them.

verses.name: Mark 1:32
verses.text: And at even, when the sun did set, they brought unto him all that were diseased, and them that were possessed with devils.

verses.name: Mark 1:33
verses.text: And all the city was gathered together at the door.

verses.name: Mark 1:34
verses.text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases, and cast out many devils; and suffered not the devils to speak, because they knew him.
